BasicInfo.short: The world's 1st Virtual Reality (VR) satellite, delivering Cinematic, Live, Virtual Space Tourism.

Products.name: Limited Quantities: Life Time Subscription
Products.description: This exclusive limited time offer (1000 units) gives you the ability to view our space content for the rest of your life.

Products.name: One Year Subscription Pre-Order
Products.description: Be among the first to experience our Earth in a whole new way. Access to 12 months of VR content and a free VR viewing device.
